 * Snow Tech smiles at Prowl.*

 " I'm Snow Tech, Inny's Friend."

 * He heavily emphasized "Friend". He Went back to
shooting the bots that dared to fire at Prowl.*

 " You must be Inny's new boyfriend! Nice to
meet....."

 * But Prowl had gone to help Inny and he was left
alone, a blast hit him in the leg and he almost
collapsed. He growled and renued his fire at the bots.
A signal came through via his com-link. It was from
his sister. He listened carefully, and then nodded.
She was right, and no matter what he wanted to do to
these, these, BOTS, he didn't want to ruin an
alliance, that could be nasty. He put away his
electric blaster and dogged the blasts that still
came. He then limped off into the bushes, and began to
hobble to the ark, or what was left of it anyway.*

-------------------------------------------------------

 * Shadow Cat had really not paid attention to the Ark
when she had come, but now saw that it was partially
blown-up. She growled. Imature or what! I mean,
blowing up the Ark for some misunderstanding! She
sighed again. When will she learn to keep out of
others business!*
> Prowl looks at Snow Tech as he runs up to him.
